channel.title: CVE Feed for Apple -- Installer of QuickTime for Windows
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Apple -- Installer of QuickTime for Windows

item.title: CVE-2017-2218|2024-08-05T13:48:04.370Z -- apple -- installer%20of%20quicktime%20for%20windows
item.description: Untrusted search path vulnerability in Installer of QuickTime for Windows allows an attacker to gain privileges via a Trojan horse DLL in an unspecified directory.
